title: "Kroger Broke Privacy Law With Facial Scans, Ill. Worker Says"
excerpt: "The Kroger Co. and one of its subsidiaries got hit Friday with proposed class state court claims that the companies use video camera software that captures facial geometric data in violation of workers' and customers' biometric privacy rights."
